backend/main.mo: Actor module managing user profiles and premium status with access control and admin/user permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of major frontend components, pages, data files, and settings modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing root container and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, wraps the app with QueryClientProvider and ThemeProvider, and initializes all page routes.
frontend/src/components/chapters/Chapter: Renders a subject header and a grid of chapter cards linking to chapter detail pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the global app layout with navigation header, main content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/learning-modes/L: Displays learning mode icons from a sprite sheet based on mode ID and calculated background positioning.
frontend/src/components/nav/PrimaryNav.t: Responsive primary navigation bar with desktop links and mobile sheet drawer, highlighting active routes.
frontend/src/components/settings/Premium: UI card for premium status that handles login via Internet Identity and triggers premium upgrade mutations.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Renders a settings category with toggles, selects, and sliders tied to an update handler.
frontend/src/data/learningModes.ts: Exports a list of learning mode definitions with ids, names, and descriptions.
frontend/src/data/ncertClass10Chapters.t: Defines subjects and a mapping of NCERT Class 10 chapters for each subject.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, premium status, and upgrade actions via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for theming, including dark, high-contrast, and compact modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ChapterDetailPage.tsx: Displays chapter details with navigation, subject info, and links to available learning modes, including error handling for missing chapters.
frontend/src/pages/ChaptersPage.tsx: Renders a tabbed interface for browsing NCERT Class 10 chapters by subject with scrollable tabs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the landing page with a hero banner, quick-access cards, and feature highlights for the learning platform.
frontend/src/pages/LearningModeRunPage.t: Shows a specific learning mode's detail and related chapter context with breadcrumb navigation and a placeholder content area.
frontend/src/pages/LearningModesPage.tsx: Lists all learning modes with icons and descriptions, linking to each modeâ€™s run page.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Displays all settings categories, allowing users to adjust preferences using the settings schema and hooks.
frontend/src/settings/applySettings.ts: Applies user settings to the document root, updating classes and CSS variables for theme, spacing, motion, and contrast.
frontend/src/settings/settingsSchema.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for settings and provides a schema of categorized app settings with defaults and options.
frontend/src/settings/useSettings.ts: Implements a React hook to load, persist, update, and reset user settings using localStorage and applies them on change.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, existing features, and known issues for the Class 10 learning app.
